title: Missing blue essence
body: When i did the log in in the account named davidfvo on NA server there were a notice that my rune pages were converted into blue essence with a total value of 27,000 blue essence but my blue essence didnt go up.

replies.body: You still need to play a match (not win, just play) in order to complete the mission that gives you the converted BE. After that you'll have some orbs in your loot to open for the BE.
